title: r/Entitledparents BEHOLD MEGA-KAREN! DESTROYER OF MANAGERS!
description:
r/Entitledparents Today, I've got a truly special treat for you! An INSANELY entitled Karen actually makes a post on Reddit complaining about a customer service rep. He post is absolutely nuts, and its clear just how deluded and self-entitled she is, even though she's clearly spinning the story to try to make herself sound more sympathetic. If you want more stories like this, subscribe and hit the like button to support my channel!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gsBQpK3eCdY
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
